input.sentences: today we took a family trip to the beach .
the kids had so much fun running in the sand .
then we built sand castles together .
we did discover some beautiful pink flowers .
before leaving i did manage to get to walk barefoot in the sand . it was so relaxing .
output.sentences: We all  recently went on a trip as a family to the beach.
The kids enjoyed running in the sand.
There were many sand castles built.
There was much to discover with beautiful objetcs such as these pink flowers.
I really enjoyed relaxing as I walked on the sand at the beach.
